query:
select 
	case 
		when location = 'United States of America' then 'United States'
		when location = 'Russian Federation' then 'Russia'
		when location = 'Iran (Islamic Republic of)' then 'Iran'
		when location = 'Bolivia (Plurinational State of)' then 'Bolivia'
		when location = 'Dem. People''s Republic of Korea' then 'Dem. Rep. Korea'
		when location = 'Republic of Korea' then 'Korea'
		when location = 'Venezuela (Bolivarian Republic of)' then 'Venezuela'
		when location = 'Dominican Republic' then 'Dominican Rep.'
		when location = 'Viet Nam' then 'Vietnam'
		when location = 'Lao People''s Democratic Republic' then 'Lao PDR'
		when location = 'Brunei Darussalam' then 'Brunei'
		when location = 'Solomon Islands' then 'Solomon Is.'
		when location = 'Czechia' then 'Czech Rep.'
		when location = 'Western Sahara' then 'W. Sahara'
		when location = 'Republic of Moldova' then 'Moldova'
		when location = 'Falkland Islands (Malvinas)' then 'Falkland Is.'
		when location = 'Central African Republic' then 'Central African Rep.'
		when location = 'South Sudan' then 'S. Sudan'
		when location = 'Democratic Republic of the Congo' then 'Dem. Rep. Congo'
		when location = 'United Republic of Tanzania' then 'Tanzania'
		when location = 'Syrian Arab Republic' then 'Syria'
		else location
	end as location, 
	year, 
	(pop_total * 1000)::bigint population
	from global_population
	where year = {{ Year }} and loc_id < 900
	order by location
name: WorldPopulation
